name: soaring-symbols
title: Soaring Symbols
description: Browse and search a curated collection of airline branding assets — logos, icons, and tails in SVG
author: anhthang

commands.name: browse-airlines
commands.title: Browse Airlines
commands.subtitle: Soaring Symbols
commands.description: Browse and search a curated collection of airline branding assets — logos, icons, and tails in SVG.

commands.name: airline-info
commands.title: Airline Information
commands.subtitle: Soaring Symbols
commands.description: View detailed airline information including name, IATA, ICAO, country, website, and related assets.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
